description.narrative: J-Lab3l has started out from a desire to produce sustainable fashion. After creating and selling a first small collection, the company wanted to further professionalize and produce a larger collection. Finding the right partner to produce a collection with is what DGGF-TA supported, by including a consultant to audit factories in India, and to support the technical production strategy as well as the purchasing strategy for the company. After finding a suitable factory, a sample collection and thereafter a collection have been produced and pre-financed by DGGF-TA. The Indian factory that has been chosen to work with focuses on women empowerment throughout the organization, including putting women in management positions. Production of the both the sample collection and production of the first complete collection has led to 26 indirect supported jobs and 4 people were trained during the course of the project.
